actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To improve the safety of rail transportation of hazardous materials, and for other purposes.
short_title: Safe Rail Transportation of Hazardous Materials Act of 1989

summary.text: Safe Rail Transportation of Hazardous Materials Act of 1989 - Requires railroad companies to provide specific training to employees involved in the transportation of hazardous materials. Amends the Hazardous Materials Transportation Act to make any person who commits a violation of this Act liable to the United States for a civil penalty (currently such violation must be knowingly committed). Requires the Secretary of Transportation to issue regulations requiring compliance with specified safety standards with respect to hazardous materials transportation by rail carriers.

titles.title: Safe Rail Transportation of Hazardous Materials Act of 1989
To improve the safety of rail transportation of hazardous materials, and for other purposes.
